Directions: In a large bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into 1-1/2-in. balls. In a large skillet, brown meatballs; drain. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until the meat is no longer pink, stirring occasionally.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
